name: oxaceprol
content: Oxaceprol is an anti-inflammatory drug used in the treatment of osteoarthritis. It is derived from L-proline, a DNA-encoded amino acid. The active effect of Oxaceprol is to inhibit the adhesion and migration of white blood cells.   == References ==   == External links == "Oxaceprol". Drug Information Portal. U.S. National Library of Medicine.
